articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Pacers tie playoff record with 41-point halftime lead in Game 4 - NBA
articles.description: Indiana dominates the 1st half, shooting 60% from the field and making 12 of 18 3-pointers while posting 25 assists.
articles.content:
Guard Bennedict Mathurin is ejected in the 1st quarter of Game 4 against the Cavaliers, but the Pacers lock in and dominate.
INDIANAPOLIS (AP) The Indiana Pacers tied an NBA playoff record by buildi… [+1014 chars]

articles.author: Sudhi Ranjan Sen, Faseeh Mangi, Dan Strumpf, Akayla Gardner
articles.title: Trump Truce Leaves India Furious, Pakistan Elated as Risks Loom - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: After four days that saw the worst fighting between India and Pakistan in half a century, as well as some nuclear saber-rattling, Donald Trump on Saturday declared that both countries had reached a “FULL AND IMMEDIATE CEASEFIRE.”
